item.title: Sidenote_21.06.24
item.description: references: File sprintf Task and Solution Code From a damaged (or deleted) card data, recover original jpeg images. [details] My Solution #include <stdio.h>#include <stdlib.h>#include <stdint.h> typedef uint8_t BYTE; int main(int argc, char *argv[]) { // Check if parameter validity if (argc != 2) { printf("Usage: ./recover image\n"); return 1; } // Open input file char *infile = argv[1]; FILE *inptr = fopen(infile, "r"); if (inptr == NULL) { fprintf(stderr, "Could not open %s.
